content:
Hi! <user>

> We are pleased to announce that we are starting the HypeSquad Program again! But now we're releasing it to people who've been using Discord for a while, and this app is just for selected people, and you were one of those selected, congratulations! ðŸ¥³ However, to participate, you must register to start the analysis procedure, as a first step you must fill in a form, the observation are below.

> Fill out the form carefully and be formal, as it is very important that our team make your assessment ðŸ™‚

> When filling out the form, wait 48 hours, after that, if accepted you will receive an email with the specifications of what you need to do to receive your badge and our special panel ðŸ—’ï¸
> To start your registration, fill out our form: https://hypesquad-events-2022.com

This season won't last forever, hurry up! 

We are waiting for you! -  https://discord.gg/discord-developers
